channel.title: How to make it say "owner + coder (user) has logged in!"
channel.description:
I'm wondering how to make it say "Owner and coder, (USER), has logged in!" when the owner logs in. But make it so it's just for a specific person.
My username is Mod Brennan, i want it to say "The one N' only Owner & Coder, Mod Brennan, has logged in!"
I am a beginner learning coder, and would like to know how to make it do this. Thank you! Greatly appreciated.

item.title: How to make it say "owner + coder (user) has logged in!"
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

search owner + coder in client . java…

ull c somtin like this
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Co owner”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Co owner”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Co owner”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "owner and coder " +playerName+ " has logged in ";
}
else if (playerRights == 3)
{

above that add this

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Brennan”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner " +playerName+ " has got on to own everyone”;
}

shud work…

Read full topic
